channel.title: War on Camelot [PI] Final Release
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i1098.photobucket.com/albums/g378/jerkinwhite/WaronCamelotbanner.jpg[/img]
Hello, and welcome to my recent project: War on Camelot.
I hosted it for a while, but I didn't get as many players as I'd hoped. I'm going to be moving on to a new project now, so I figured I'd release.
This isn't a crappy Cammy PvP base. It is based off Project Insanity/DSPK. It is highly edited and has many new features. I started this because I was tired of seeing Cammy PvP bases everywhere. Hopefully they'll use PI now. I learned a lot during this project, and it was a lot of fun. I hope you guys will learn as much as I have and benefit from this release.
[b]Things that were already on server:[/b] Has a lot of bosses Clue scrolls Gambling New items, eg. Dragon Masks 508+ graphics, anims, objects, etc
That's about the only things that were good, lol.
[b]Things I added:[/b] The BEST skilling zone, imo. Worked on it a lot. Easter Event World PvP Customized Cammy bank (home) Spawning, you can't spawn items like Godswords, need to be obtained by bosses or by other means. (wanted there to be somewhat of an economy) Party room is multi A pure pk zone, where you need 45 defence or less to enter An herblore quest to start herblore, it isn't finished though
There's a lot more, just can't remember it all right now :P
[b]Media[/b]
[IMG]http://i1098.photobucket.com/alb ums/g378/jerkinwhite/waroncammyhome.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1098.photobucket.com/albums/g378/jerkinwhite/waroncammypartyroom.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1098.photobucket.com/albums/g378/jerkinwhite/waroncammypurepkzone.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1098.photobucket.com/albums/g378/jerkinwhite/waroncammysomearmourspecs.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1098.photobucket.com/albums/g378/jerkinwhite/waroncammymagic.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1098.photobucket.com/albums/g378/jerkinwhite/waroncammyskilling.jpg[/img] ^ Skilling area ^
[IMG]http://i1098.photobucket.com/albums/g378/jerkinwhite/waroncammygodwars.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1098.photobucket.com/albums/g378/jerkinwhite/waroncammycorp.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1098.photobucket.com/albums/g378/jerkinwhite/waroncammykbd.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1098.photobucket.com/albums/g378/jerkinwhite/Waroncammydags.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1098.photobucket.com/albums/g378/jerkinwhite/waroncammyminigames.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1098.photobucket.com/albums/g378/jerkinwhite/waroncammyeasterevent.jpg[/img]
Credits -Sanity -$The True Killer$ from R-S -Graham -Wl -Dakkia/Dakia? -LmcTruck -Hazey/Hazely?[/center]
Package (Server and Client)(Fixed Memory Leak): http://up.ht/ew1hh6
Cache: http://up.ht/icKEXr
Just put the cache into your (C:)
Thanks for all of the positive comments guys! Glad your enjoying the release.

item.title: War on Camelot [PI] Final Release
item.dc:creator: @TheHolyGrail TheHolyGrail
item.description:
@TheHolyGrail wrote:

[quote=“we rushed god, post:36, topic:390003”]trying to run it for the first time… cant run the client just closes out immediately… any help??[/quote]If you read what it says before it closes out, you would know the problem. Go into Gui.java and search for no-ip and just change that to 127.0.0.1 or your no-ip address or whatever. ;D

[quote=“ReaperZScape, post:35, topic:390003”]How do u make it so that everyrwhere isnt pvp?[/quote]Go to src/server/model/players/Player.java and search for isInFala and delete the coordinates that say something like (absX > 1000 && absX < 9000 && absY > 1000 && absY < 9000)

Read full topic
